title: Remove empty `patternProperties` object
description: `patternProperties:{}` does nothing and should be removed.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: Empty patternProperties
comprehensiveExamples.description: An empty object under patternProperties has no effect and should be dropped.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: Meaningful regex-based constraints
comprehensiveExamples.description: Using regex keys to constrain property names is valid.
